field.name: duration
field.comment: if times are flexible then duration is probably more appropriate than an end_time field

field.name: is_flexible
field.title: Is Flexible
field.comment: boolean indicating whether or not the time is flexible

field.name: quantity
field.title: Quantity
field.comment: the number of volunteers needed for this need in each time slot

field.name: role_id
field.title: Role associated with this Need
field.comment: Initially, this will be just a label (e.g., Lifeguard), but in future releases roles will have additional properties, such as qualifications.

field.name: entity_id
field.comment: Artificial FK to other CiviCRM entity.
